document.title: Technical Bulletins: Some Guidelines for Charitable Appropriations
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin provides guidelines for Tennessee municipalities facing requests for aid from charitable organizations that are increasing in number and in dollar amount. Included is a list of standard procedures for appropriating and disbursing municipal funds to non-profit charitable organizations.
